name: The Tin Woodman of Oz
summary: The Tin Woodman, whose real name is Nick Chopper, is unexpectedly reunited with the Munchkin Girl he had courted before he became a tin man. Sadly, she has a new love and no longer cares for him. As he attempts to regain her affection, Nick discovers a fellow tin man, Captain Fyter, as well as a Frankenstein monster-like creature, Chopfyt, made from their combined parts by the tinsmith, Ku-Klip.
info:
• 中文名: 奥兹国的铁樵夫
  • 作者: Lyman Frank Baum
  • 别名: オズのブリキの木樵り
  • 别名: 铁皮樵夫
  • 别名: 欧兹国的铁樵夫
  • 出版社: Reilly & Lee
  • 发售日: 1918年
  • 插画: John R. Neill
